name: Snowman Slide
description:
A snowman seeks revenge on Santa for bulldozing his family to make room for a new factory, help him in his search for vengeance!

Creator Notes:

I started this game jam pretty late and didn't get as much done as I had hoped, I had planned for better art, cutscenes, more levels and enemy types and fixing some of the visual and other bug fixes but that can be done in the future. If people enjoy the game I will continue to work on the game until after Christmas. Let me know what you think, I appreciate criticism just as much as praise, Thanks :)
